name: Your Team
description:
In Your Team, you are taking control of a 5-man team. Your goal is to make it the most followed one.

You can do so, by scheduling your team's day. They can practice, stream or chill around.

Watch out not to get them too stressed out, or your team will fall apart, making you lose all your progress and start from the beginning.

Click on followers

to see how high in the ranking your team is.
